attributes.action: fully support the Campaign for better Breast Cancer Screening in Middleton Manchester
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am writing on behalf of the Cancer Support group which meets at Demesne community centre in Middleton.  I am also a member of Breakthrough Breast Cancer and have for the last two years been raising awareness of the importance of Breast Screening and lobbying my MP Jim Dobbin. 

At present, women have to travel to Rochdale or Bury for screenings, but with the construction of the town's new health centre it could be the ideal time to install a digital mammography machine within the health centre enabling women to access the service locally.
